data.expected_result: The Invite Link should not crash the discord app, and should open in the app allowing you to join a server.
data.short_description: Opening invite link in chrome crashes discord app.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Internet Browser - Visit discord.gg/discord-testers OR discord.gg/quikblend (Other links may/may not crash too) - The Discord client will crash.
